desc: Turn the tap off when brushing your teeth
Use the dishwasher instead of washing by hand
Start the dishwasher only when full
Don't leave your television on without anyone watching
Before using the hairdryer, dry your hair as much as you can with a towel
Use (and re-use) a glass bottle instead of a plastic one
Try producing only a bag of mixed waste
Use public transport instead of your car
Use your car only if all the seats are occupied
Check your food storage before going to buy groceries
Go eat out only once this week
